bladdr 0.0.8.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • using-pcr-functions

(Re)calculate rq for a given sample

pcr_rq.Rd

(Re)calculate rq for a given sample

pcr_rq(data, relative_sample)

Arguments

data

A dataset output from pcr_tidy/pcr_control
relative_sample

A sample to set others relative to (eg my_dmso_sample)

Value

A tibble

Examples

dat_path <- system.file("extdata", "untidy-pcr-example.xls", package = "bladdr")

pcr_tidy(dat_path) %>%
pcr_rq("U6D1")

#> New names:
#> * `` -> ...3
#> * `` -> ...4
#> * `` -> ...5
#> * `` -> ...6
#> * `` -> ...7
#> * ...
#> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion
#> # A tibble: 267 × 39
#> # Groups:   target_name [5]
#>    omit  sample_name target_name task    reporter quencher quantity quantity_mean
#>    <chr> <chr>       <chr>       <chr>   <chr>    <chr>       <dbl>         <dbl>
#>  1 FALSE RD1         KRT14       UNKNOWN FAM      NFQ-MGB        NA            NA
#>  2 FALSE RD1         KRT14       UNKNOWN FAM      NFQ-MGB        NA            NA
#>  3 FALSE RD1         KRT14       UNKNOWN FAM      NFQ-MGB        NA            NA
#>  4 FALSE RD1         CDH3        UNKNOWN FAM      NFQ-MGB        NA            NA
#>  5 FALSE RD1         CDH3        UNKNOWN FAM      NFQ-MGB        NA            NA
#>  6 FALSE RD1         CDH3        UNKNOWN FAM      NFQ-MGB        NA            NA
#>  7 FALSE RD1         GATA3       UNKNOWN FAM      NFQ-MGB        NA            NA
#>  8 FALSE RD1         GATA3       UNKNOWN FAM      NFQ-MGB        NA            NA
#>  9 FALSE RD1         GATA3       UNKNOWN FAM      NFQ-MGB        NA            NA

#> # … with 257 more rows, and 31 more variables: quantity_sd <dbl>, rq <dbl>,
#> #   rq_min <dbl>, rq_max <dbl>, ct_mean <dbl>, ct_sd <dbl>, delta_ct <dbl>,

# Can also be run after using pcr_control:
pcr_tidy(dat_path) %>%
pcr_control("GAPDH") %>%
pcr_rq("U6D1")

#> New names:
#> * `` -> ...3
#> * `` -> ...4
#> * `` -> ...5
#> * `` -> ...6
#> * `` -> ...7
#> * ...
